title: 1978 Mercedes-Benz 450

description: For sale at Gateway Classic Cars in our St. Louis showroom is a 1987 Mercedes-Benz 560SL.  Power comes from a smooth running German V8 measuring 5.6 liters and producing 227 horsepower and a healthy 287 lbs./ft. of torque.  Plenty of power for this 2 door convertible.  There's something about driving a German car.  Everything fits very well, a nice thud when you close the door and a significant lack of rattles when cruising down the highway.  This was a classic the day it rolled off the assembly line.  Mercedes began production for this model in 1971 and was an instant hit.  Production went all the way through 1989 with a production total over 300,000 units!  1986 saw the introduction of the 560 that would end up becoming the most desirable of this model series.  Power was up significantly, and sales went up with it.  This beautiful example has covered 166,447 miles since it was purchased new in 1987 out in California.  Now on its third owner and with receipts for a top end engine rebuild adding new life to the smooth running V8.  The car spent all its life in California until 2010.  The red paint has a great shine, all the doors open and close very well thanks to a clean history report.  The black leather interior doesn't come close to looking old or worn out.  If you're ready to cruise in style without breaking the bank, look no further and call our St. Louis showroom at 618-271-3000 or swing by for a closer look.  To view HD photos and video, visit www.gatewayclassiccars.com
title: 1987 Mercedes-Benz 560-Class

title: 1982 Mercedes-Benz 380-Class

description: Here is the chance to own THE NEXT COLLECTABLE  SL ROADSTER - 1988 Mercedes-Benz 560SL.
This beauty was just inspected and appraised at $21,500!!!
Exterior:

It’s ORIGINAL and highly desirable Arctic White paint (color code #147 arcticweiss) looks and shines like the day it left the showroom floor, and combined with Palomino leather interior this particular 560SL just looks stunning!!! Chrome is in excellent condition, it is complete and new looking, and this beautiful roadster is a head turner and conversation piece everywhere it goes.

This Mercedes is super solid and rust free !!  Body is in wonderful condition and it is straight as an arrow! All doors, hood, and trunk are operating with ease and everything lines up properly! ALL body panels including front and rear bumpers feature original VIN number stickers!!

This SL was never in an accident, and it has been always garaged, pampered and kept away from rain and bad weather, and it truly shows!! Factory VIN # stamping on the front radiator support is another sign of originality of this car.

Like they say “Originality is king when it comes to classic cars”!! Not only does finding a 30ish year old car that has not been altered by numerous past owners add to your enjoyment of the car; the more original features that you can substantiate the better when it comes time to sell your treasure!!!

Experienced car collectors and investors have learned that a solid, sound, original body is the most important aspect of any vintage car! Mechanical rebuilds are straight forward and not costly compared to trying to correct a previously crashed or rusted car. One cannot throw enough money at a car with a bad body to make it right or equal to a car with a great original structure like on this beauty!!

This beauty comes equipped with both soft top, and the hard top! Black soft top is new and in excellent condition!! Original Hard top is also in excellent condition, including all the glass, and the headliner which is clean, and rips and tears free!!
Another sign of originality of this beautiful car is stamping mark on the Hard Top (77760) which reflects the last 5 digits of the vehicles VIN number!!!
All 4 tires are matching, like new with plenty of thread, and they make this Roadster float on the road!!
-Interior

Original Palomino Leather interior is in excellent condition, and it looks like the day it left the showroom floor! Carpet is clean and in excellent shape! Leather seats are in excellent condition as well, and are very supportive and comfortable.
This Mercedes also comes with power windows, and they are working as they should! Everything on this car is working, from power windows, to the power antenna.
-Engine & Transmission

Powerful 5.6 Liter V8 Engine starts with ease, and it is strong and powerful as ever with only 106,000 miles on the odometer (only about 3,500 miles per year!!). It has no problems reaching 80MPH+ and its real blast to drive!!! It rides very snug and comfortable like the Mercedes-Benz designed it to ride!

This SL has thousands spent into its maintenance over the past few years as its owner wanted to make sure that this beauty runs as good as it looks!! Most Recent service shows the following: all new brakes, including all new rear calipers, front and rear brake rotors, brake pads, brake hoses, new sub frame bushings, engine and transmission mounts, brand new Denso A/C compressor, etc…. Timing chain along with the tensioner  and guides has been replaced at 101,000 as per Mercedes-Benz requirements! Maintenance booklet is full of timely service records and stamps since the day 1!!
Automatic Transmission shifts effortlessly through every gear, and it makes this SL absolute joy to drive and cruise in!
This beautiful Mercedes comes with ALL of its original books and manuals, original owner’s registration, as well as with its original Tool Set!
WE SHIP AND EXPORT WORLDWIDE!!!

description: Here we have a cool 1971 Mercedes Benz 280SL pagoda that we took in on trade.  .  This car is a great example of a 280SL and runs as good as she looks.  The car comes with the automatic transmission, air conditioning, hard top, and a blue soft top.  This is a US model and has been very well taken care of through the years.  The car looks to have been repainted, but the car is an original white over blue car from the factory.  Someone upgraded the car with chrome accents, custom diamond inserts in the hood and trunk, and special carpet for the tools as well as spare tire.  You can tell this was someones pride and joy at one time.  Car runs and drives great, but please understand this is a 46 year old car so they aren't perfect and that is why it is priced so well.   Thank you for stopping by and we look forward to hearing from you.

title: 1968 Mercedes-Benz 280-Class

description: White w/Red interior. 2.8-liter straight 6-cyl engine, 4-spd manual transmission.
Absolutely beautiful and very original 280 with a very rare 4-spd manual transmission!

The SL has always had a mystique to it.  From the mighty SL race cars of the 30’s to the high-performance street cars of today, Mercedes has always reserved the SL moniker for their top of the line luxury/sports cars.  The SL’s of the late ’60’s- early ’70’s have been particularly popular with collectors.  The style of these “Pagoda” top convertibles are timeless and these cars still turn heads whenever they’re spotted cruising around Rodeo Drive or down PCH.

One of only 850 SL’s produced in ’71, this striking example is very original other than one repaint.  It’s been well maintained over the years and features a very rare 4-spd. manual transmission.   It’s basically untouched, with the exception of maintenance.  Optioned with factory air conditioning, Becker radio and rare Burgundy interior.  It even has the original soft top still under the rear deck!  The car is beautiful throughout and is a pleasure to drive!
title: 1971 Mercedes-Benz 280-Class

description: Streetside Classics probably sells more R107 Mercedes-Benz SLs than anyone else, and we've developed a pretty good eye for these cars. This 1984 380SL is a great balance of performance, style, price, and preservation, and for open-air motoring, the SL is still pretty tough to beat.

In the mid-80s, wild colors were in fashion, but ever-conservative Mercedes-Benz always got it right. In this car's case, it's beautiful silver-blue bodywork with dark blue hides inside, a combination that has looked great for decades, if not centuries. The light blue respray gives the SL a big car look despite its rather diminutive size, and in a Mercedes, elegance is never an option but mandatory. The light color also emphasizes how straight and clean this one is, thanks to a lifetime in a warm climate and only 94,539 miles showing on the odometer (that's not many at all on a 30-year-old Mercedes-Benz). A dark blue pinstripe offers a bit of contrast and the light colors like this do a much better job of disguising the heavy federally-mandated bumpers, so it looks sleek and trim compared to many of its siblings. There's plenty of shine, but a dedicated hobbyist could really take it up a notch with a professional buff so that the car can live up to the legacy of the three-pointed star on its nose. Someone added a '560SL' emblem to the tail, as well as a center stop lamp, but that's an innocent upgrade that most folks won't notice.

Most R107 SLs received MB-Tex vinyl, but this lovely roadster wears genuine leather, which makes a big difference in the way it feels. The design is familiar, of course, but that's part of the SL's appeal, and with everything so sensibly arranged and logical, is there really any other way to do it? The upholstery's condition is very good all around, particularly for an open car, and aside from a split in the dash pad, it looks great. Big, easy-to-read gauges were a Mercedes-Benz hallmark for decades and the giant steering wheel makes this car feel substantial when you're at the helm. Features like automatic climate control, power windows, and cruise control mean it's one of the most user-friendly 2-seaters you can own and the lovely carpeted package shelf behind the seats offers good storage space when you're in a hurry. A convertible top stows neatly under the hard boot in back and looks almost new and like all SLs, it includes a removable hardtop.

In 1980, the SL switched to a 3.8 liter V8, which still delivers the kind of effortless performance for which these cars are famous. They're also quite reliable and easy to maintain, so don't be afraid of owning this one. It starts easily with a familiar V8 thrum from the exhaust and the bubbly idle and smooth torque make it feel beautifully polished from behind the wheel. The engine bay has been maintained over the years and remains clean, and it's full of correct parts, so no worries about deferred maintenance here. The 3-speed automatic transmission has a knack
title: 1984 Mercedes-Benz 380-Class

description: *ONLY 42,953 MILES*CARFAX CERTIFIED*DEEP-TREAD YOKOHAMA TIRES* *THE RETAIL IN 1986 WAS $54,600*PANASONIC PREMIUM AUDIO SYSTEM WITH IN-DASH CD PLAYER*DARK BROWN SOFT TOP*A GREAT & SOLID INVESTMENT*        ********************************************************************************************************************************************************* *ONE OF THE FINEST 560 SL ROADSTER EXAMPLES ON THE MARKET TODAY* *PRISTINE CONDITION*IN TEXAS SINCE DAY ONE AND IS ABSOLUTELY 100% RUST FREE*VERY WELL MAINTAINED W/SERVICE RECORDS*VERY DESIRABLE COLOR COMBINATION* HARDTOP AND SOFT TOP*PERFECT AS A WEEKEND DRIVER OR INVESTMENT*PLEASE CONTACT ROD DIRECTLY @ 954-658-4545 ********************************************************************************************************************************************************* PODIUM AUTO is very pleased to welcome this exceptional, stunning, safe, solid and luxurious 560 SL Roadster Coupe for your review and consideration. This low mileage Mercedes also has an amazing powertrain combination that is so impressive, along with a ride this is simply outstanding. Fully serviced (Over $5,000) in May 2016, the previous owner babied this Benz! With such low miles and Carfax Certified Accident Free, future resale will also be great. Our many untouched photos say it all...this one is the real deal!  The color combinations on this Mercedes 560 SL Roadster are so stunning and luxurious. The Arctic White exterior finish has maintained (Even after 31 years!) a deep, rich and high gloss like the day it was manufactured and the laser straight lines show the unique style that has made this Benz model so popular to this day! The interior is in incredible condition and the Premium Palomino Leather is soft and supple with no rips, tears or stains. The dashboard has been designed to be user friendly and any trip in this Mercedes will be a total thrill! With no interior smoke odors, we assume a previous non-smoker.  This 560 SL Roadster has so many great features for your driving enjoyment! Ice Cold Automatic Climate Control, Premium Panasonic Audio System with CD Player, Deep Tread Yokohama Tires, Power Windows, Central Locking System, Cruise Control, Dark Brown Soft Top, Halogen Headlights, Front Fog Lights, Rear Window Defroster, Leather Covered Steering Wheel, Removable HardTop, Rear Wheel Drive, Tinted Glass, Light Mercedes Benz Alloy Wheels, Anti-Theft Alarm System, Windshield Wipers with Mist Control, Automatic Antenna, Premium Leather Seats. Carfax Certified & so much more.     This 560 SL has a tremendous powertrain combination! The 5.6L, V8, 272 HP engine combined with its Four-Speed Automatic Transmission will more than deliver all of the power and all of the performance that you will ever need. Your safety is always #1 with Mercede Benz. Supplemental Restraint System for Front Seat Passengers, Drivers Side Airbag, Power Assisted Four-Wheel Disc Brakes, Limited Slip Differential, Anti-Lock Braking System, Fully I
